Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、アガーテ女王は、 死んじまったのかな？
あの爆発の時……オレはクレアを 救い出すので精一杯だったが……
Entry.EnglishText: At the time of the explosion, I was doing everything I could to save Claire, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: あの光の中は、ものすごい力が渦巻いていた…… 無事では済まないだろうな……
Entry.EnglishText: An incredible power was circulating within that light... I wonder if one could get out of that unscathed...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、王国は何も発表してません。 あの儀式の事も、女王様がいなくなった事も……
Entry.EnglishText: But the kingdom has yet to announce anything about either the ceremony or the death of the Queen...

Entry.JapaneseText: 確かに、みんな別に騒ぐでもなく 普通に生活してるよな、どこの街でも。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah. It seems that wherever you go, people are just living their lives like usual, completely undisturbed.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……もし生きているのなら、 女王は今どこにいるんだろうな……
Entry.EnglishText: If the Queen is still alive, I wonder where she would be...
